title.native: ガーリッシュ ナンバー

description:
College student Chitose Karasuma is determined not to do boring things as she enters the adult world. To this end, this bad-mannered beauty barges into a facility that trains would-be voice actors and actresses, somehow landing a job at “Number One Produce,” a voice actress agency managed by her older brother, Gojou. In Chitose’s mind, she’s poised for greatness, but finds herself at a loss when she continues to only get minor roles. As she clashes with other girls in the agency, including a cunning airhead and a girl with a Kansai accent, Chitose is about to learn that there’s more to succeeding in this competitive industry than she imagined.

(Source: Sentai Filmworks)

node.description:
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/watariwataru)

Wataru is a light novel writer who is best known for being the author of [Yahari Ore no Seishun Love Comedy wa Machigatteiru.](https://anilist.co/manga/70171/Yahari-Ore-no-Seishun-Love-Comedy-wa-Machigatteiru/) In March of 2009, he graduated from Meiji University in Communication and Information.

He initially decided to become a light novel writer because he was having difficulty finding a job. He is currently working at a company as a salaryman while being a part-time writer, with no plans of making writing his full-time occupation.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/watariwataru)

node.description:
QP:flapper is an illustrator unit conformed by the illustrators Tometa Ohara and Koharu Sakura.

[Twitter (Tometa Ohara's Account)](https://twitter.com/tometa_qp) | [Twitter (Koharu Sakura's Account)](https://twitter.com/pimopimo) | [Pixiv (Koharu Sakura's Account)](https://www.pixiv.net/en/users/10538) | [Blog (Tometa Ohara's Blog)](http://tometa.blog10.fc2.com/) | [Blog (Koharu Sakura's Blog)](http://pimeco.blog10.fc2.com/) | [Official Website](http://qp.banbi.net/)

__[Website](http://kikuyatomoki.com/)__

__Birthplace:__ Mitaka, Tokyo, Japan

__Introduction:__
Tomoki Kikuya is a Japanese composer and arranger, who works for music studio Popholic. His brother Kikuya Hiroki (菊谷宏樹), is the director of TVK's saku saku music show.

__Biography:__
Kikuya started a career as guitarist in the music band Mustang A.K.A under Sony Records. Later he was part of Funanori. Starting from 2005 Kikuya decided to focus on working as a music composer and arranger. He has arranged and composed several songs featured in anime since then, starting with theme songs for Pani Poni Dash.
_Note: Not to be confused with either the [animator](https://anilist.co/staff/157702/), or the [editor](https://anilist.co/staff/181541/) by the same name._
**Murakami Masayuki (村上仁之)** is a Japanese producer and animation planner.

Current president of [diomedéa](https://anilist.co/studio/51/diomeda) since 2006. Makoto Kohara was formerly an animator at [Shaft](https://anilist.co/studio/44/Shaft) and trained animators such as [Mai Ootsuka](https://anilist.co/staff/103975/Mai-Ootsuka). He is still occasionally active as a director and animator.
Junichirou Tanaka is a producer working for TBS.
Chidori Hayashi is the representative director of Medicos Entertainment.
